stories.text: I'm looking to read more about engineering for products that sell the enterprise. Things like identity requirements (SSO, SCIM, RBAC, ABAC), auditing requirements, security requirements (FEDRAMP, SOC2), billing/entitlement/invoicing requirements, etc. Do you know any of resources like this?
stories.title: Ask HN: What books to you recommend for engineering for the enterprise?
Molecular Dynamics Benchmarks GPU On 12 GPUs
Elon Musk plans to ‘vote Republican’ and warns of political attacks on him
‘National IQ’ datasets do not provide measures of cognitive ability worldwide
Software Engineering Insights from 10 Years at Google

stories.text: Hey all, new software developer here and am looking to create a project that will help solve a problem and gain me some experience. I was wondering if any of you remix users (or potential remix users) have felt that remix is missing something that could be added by a third party. Whether it is something that could be addressed through a package or if its a monitoring tool that could be developed or a chrome dev tool for debugging and testing. Really anything that comes to mind, I would love to hear it. Thanks for helping out a newbie and giving inspiration!
stories.title: What Is Remix Missing?
To feel “weathly” in SF you need $5.1M
PSA: iMessage on Android is amazing thanks to AirMessage
